text: China just locked down 50 million people amid ‘stealth Omicron’ fears. The former FDA head predicts what happens next
title: Guess Co-Founder Paul Marciano Resigns After Misconduct Investigation

meta_data.description: Marciano reached a $500,000 with 5 individuals who accused him of harassment. Guess's investigation into the allegations was inconclusive.

og.title: Model Kate Upton Accused Paul Marciano of Sexual Harassment. Now the Guess Co-Founder Has Left the Company
og.description: Marciano reached $500,000 in settlements with five accusers.
